original_text: I had no rest in my spirit, because I found not Titus my brother: but taking my leave of them, I went from thence into Macedonia.
korean_text: 내가 내 형제 디도를 만나지 못하므로 내 심령이 편하지 못하여 그들을 작별하고 마게도냐로 갔노라

sentences.original_text: I had no rest in my spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 영에 안식을 얻지 못하였으니

sentences.original_text: because I found not Titus my brother
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 내 형제 디도를 만나지 못하였음이라

sentences.original_text: but taking my leave of them
I went from thence into Macedonia
